events.message: I just received my order and unfortunately the item arrived with multiple scratches and seems faulty. I am quite disappointed as I was expecting a new product in perfect condition.
The reported problem has been identified as a product defect issue due to scratches and functional concerns mentioned by the customer.
The case has been assigned to support agent Maria Hernandez to manage the resolution process for the defective product.
Hello, I’m Maria from customer support. Sorry to hear your product arrived damaged. I’m here to help get this sorted out for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please send us photos of the scratches and any faulty parts? This will help us process your claim promptly.
I have attached several pictures showing the scratches on the surface and the faulty button that doesn’t work properly. Please let me know what the next steps are.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement item shipped at no cost or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know which option works best for you.
I would like to receive a replacement. Thank you for handling this quickly and for the clear options you've provided.
The replacement order has been processed and dispatched. You should receive tracking details shortly. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to confirm you’ve received your replacement product and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you require further assistance.
The replacement arrived today and it’s in perfect condition. I’m very happy with the resolution. Thanks again for your help!
We’re glad everything is resolved to your satisfaction. Closing this case now. Feel free to reach out if you need assistance in the future.
